title: Pairing Geneva with headline text?
content: I am drafting up a resume. I think the readability of Geneva works, I am at a loss for a headline text. The resume is targeted at an entry level position with a print shop.
author: Byron

comments.content: Geneva was meant for the screen. it's a little clumsy in print. If you want to go the Swiss route, use Helvetica instead. Tighter spaced Helvetica Bold for headlines.
No wonder it looked so nice on the screen. I looked up close and it was not as pretty as some of the other sans serifs. I am really not wed to any particular route. I'll give Helvetica a try.
